utility.audio.smooth.help_text: Uses a 2 pole low pass filter modulated by a bandpass out of the same filter to smooth values in a way which responds well to fast changes. Algorithm by Andrew Simper of Cytomic from here: https://cytomic.com/files/dsp/DynamicSmoothing.pdf. The 'sensitivity' control governs how much the bandpass modulates the lowpass.
